description: Triangle of numbers of semi-meanders of order n with k components.
comments: Rows are in order of decreasing number of components. Diagonals give number of semi-meanders with k components. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Nov 27 2015
links: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..820
P. Di Francesco, O. Golinelli and E. Guitter, Meander, folding and arch statistics, arXiv:hep-th/9506030, 1995.
crossrefs: Diagonals include A000682, A046721, A046722, A046723, A046724, A046725. Columns include A000027, A046691. Row sums are in A000108 (Catalan numbers).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 05 2000
